summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department, authorizing construction of Contract No. 1 of the Lake Washington - North - Unit \#1 Sewer Improvement Project for the separation of existing combined sewers in the area bounded generally by 14th Avenue East on the west, East Madison Street on the south, 25th Avenue East on the east (with a run on East John Street to 30th Avenue East), and East Aloha Street on the north, and making an appropriation from the Sewer Improvement Fund therefor.
